meta.title: Wishub - Create wish lists and share with you friends

header.title: Make Wishes, Share Joy
header.subtitle: Create wishlists, reserve gifts and present what truly matters.

empty.title: You don't have any wishlists yet
empty.subtitle: Create your first wishlist and start to share it with your friends.

empty.title: You don't have any reserved gifts yet
empty.subtitle: To reserve a gift, ask your friend for a link to his wishlist.

public.label: Public
public.description: Change the list visibility to other users.

name.label: Name
name.description: The name usually used in public lists.

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Join today ahd start to share wish lists.

password.too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters.

validation.unexpected_error: Something goes wrong. Please try again later.

confirm_email.title: Confirm email on
confirm_email.description: Paste code below in confirmation form
confirm_email.comment: This email was sent automatically by wishub.app because your registered account. If you didn't, there's nothing to worry about, you can safely ignore it.

reset_password.title: Reset your password
reset_password.description: Someone recently requested a password change for your Wishub account. If this was you, you can set a new password here
reset_password.comment: If you don't want to change your password or didn't request this, just ignore and delete this message.
